name: NGOC
wishText: Hope you get better and betterrrr ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you! Wish HMN many many happy returns of the day...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Đến đây chắc cảm động lắm rồi.
replayText: Thôi thì chúc ngủ ngon hơn hôm qua một tí nhé :D
